Metuchen SEPAC

get information events about

The Metuchen Special Education Parent Advisory Council is a parent-to-parent support and advocacy group whose goal is to work towards the understanding of, respect for, and support of optimum education for all children with learning differences. We welcome all parents, teachers, care-givers, and concerned friends to join us.

We are here to help

As a parent you have rights. Know them.
